alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 11:58AM CDT until July 09 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT FOR TIPTON COUNTY... At 1157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fulton, or near Fort Pillow State Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Covington, Munford, Brighton, Tipton, Atoka, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Garland, Egypt, Canaan Grove, Bride, Gift, Gainesville, Tabernacle, Clopton, Drummonds, Idaville, Crosstown, Beaver and Akins Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
